original_title: Going Home: The Journey of Kim Jones
overview: On Sept. 15, 1999, during a rally at Wedgwood Baptist Church in Fort Worth, Texas, a tragic shooting left seven people dead, including Kim Jones, a 23-year-old seminary student who passionately loved God; she was ready for her journey home. Pastor Al Meredith of Wedgwood tells the story of that night in September and how only God could turn such tragedy into triumph. This inspiring account also features moving testimony from Kim's family.
title: Going Home: The Journey of Kim Jones
